Title: BERNEY Swiss PENDANT WATCH Brushed Gold Overlay
Description: BERNEY Swiss PENDANT WATCH Brushed Gold Overlay Swedemom is proud to present this Gold Overlay Pendant Watch from Berney of Switzerland. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The white 15mm dial (face) is signed "Berney", "Quartz" and "Swiss". It has black Arabic numerals, hour and minute hands. The back of the 18mm brushed gold overlay case features a hand-engraved flower.  This Brand New, Battery Operated watch is an heirloom quality timepiece.    SHIPPING INFORMATION Buyers in The Continental U.S. will pay $9.99 shipping and handling. PAYMENT INFORMATION Payments can be made via Paypal or credit card and is expected within 10 days of the date of sale. If payment is not received in the 10 day period, your item may be re-listed and a non-paying bidder dispute could be opened. INTERNATIONAL BUYERS Shipping and handling charges do not include customs fees, taxes or other charges that may be required. For expedited shipping, multiple item shipping, or more shipping options please contact us. MULTIPLE ITEM SHIPPING DISCOUNT Customers in the lower 48 states who purchase multiple items are eligible for a $4 combined shipping credit for each additional item.For example, if you purchase 3 items you may deduct $8 from your shipping total. All items must be paid for in a single transactionDiscount must be taken by the buyer at the time of paymentPayment must be sent no later than 5 days after the first item is won This is a general policy and some orders may qualify for more discounts. Feel free to contact us for a combined invoice with the shipping discount applied. Swedemoms hours are 8am to 5pm PST Monday-Friday.We are closed on weekends and major holidays.

Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
